::Prowler::

::Prowler(still invisible, but running low on power) takes out his 
bazooka and puts it right up against the back of Dark One's head w/o 
touching it::Say goodbye::He pulls the trigger and is sent flying 
back. OOC:Now I know that's gonna hit because 1. it's a bazooka!2. It 
was at point blancrange for gosh sakes. I also know that's gonna hurt!
